summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.9°C) and outside temperature (down 6.0°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 593 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1545 m), feels like temperature (up 8.8°C), outside temperature (up 7.5°C), and dew point temperature (up 4.0°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Possible light showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and it’s dim outside. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
